title: Battery Service warning. Manufacture date 1979 in Big Sur and Monterey.
message:
Hello

I have a Battery "Service recommended" warning on a 16" 2019 MacBook Pro (A2141) in Big Sur. The Battery has 290 cycles. Coconut Battery shows the manufacture date 1979-11-30. I have upgraded to Monterey and there is the same issue. Then I've downgraded to Catalina and everything is normal again. No service warning and Coconut Battery shows 2020-03-26. Then I upgraded back to Monterey and it shows again 1979 and the warning. SMC and PRAM reset did not help. Neither did a battery calibration. Is there any fix for this?

Thank you!

title: Battery Service warning. Manufacture date 1979 in Big Sur and Monterey.
message:
Many people complain on Internet about this Big Sur issue.
Some of them claimed that Big Sur last version solved it.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.google.com/search?q=big+sur+battery+service+recommended&client=firefox-b-d&bih=559&biw=1280&hl=es&ei=AO_uYKGZDuCIjLsPgfmw2A4&oq=big+sur+battery+service+recommended&gs_-0yBoAnAAeACAAX2IAbEbkgEFMjUuMTKYAQCgAQGqAQdnd3Mtd2l6wAEB&sclient=gws-wiz&ved=0ahUKEwihmfWy3eLxAhVgBGMBHYE8DOsQ4dUDCA0&uact=5[/URL]

Just in case, try DFU restore when the problem appears; then upgrade again.
Save any data first...
